casebody.data:
HOUSING AUTHORITY
v.
PARTEE. No. 183P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 25, 2008. Ann Moukperian, for Housing Authority. Adam Shestak, for Partee.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 658 S.E.2d 69.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of April 2008 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of April 2008."
